name: Insurami
description:
Insurami is a tech-first insurance platform entering the market with a novel product.

Their first product provides an alternative for the traditional office space security deposit. Using their product, Landlords can instantly vet new tenants from a credit risk perspective and issue a financial guarantee instead of taking a security deposit. This product provides tenants with a vastly less capital intensive way to secure an office space whilst keeping landlords protected. 

Accurately predicting the risk of tenants is a really hard problem and Insurami is a pioneer in this field. They are working with some of the UK's largest landlords, with an exciting growth pipeline.

team.title: Co-Founder & CEO
team.name: Majed Chaaraoui
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder and CEO of Insurami, the UK's first smart deposit guarantee platform

jobs.title: Front-end Engineer
jobs.description:
Front-end engineer

Job description

##About the Role
We are looking for a passionate Front-end Engineer to join our team. This role is crucial to the future User Experience of our products. You will work on our core product, prototypes, MVP’s and iterative product development. Our inital Front-end stack is based on React, MobX and Sass. 

About you
You are comfortable with all stages of product delivery from Prototype to MVP to Iterative Product Development
You have a great eye for detail and UX patterns
You have the aptitude to ascend into a leadership role
You’re enthusiastic, driven, and motivated by a challenge

Requirements
Few years commercial experience in front-end engineering.
Excellent command of JavaScript ES6+, HTML5, CSS3 
Experience and working knowledge of NodeJS
Experience with React/Angular/Vue and state management. 
Experience with using UI frameworks.
Commitment to customer success and delivering a high-quality user experience with a strong sense of visual design. 
Experience working on small teams and being self-directed.

Bonus
Bachelor's/Master’s degree in any subject

Perks
As well as working in an exciting new Insurtech business, you will also have access to:

Highly competitive salary 
Share options scheme
Private health care
Clear career progression
Birthdays off
Work from home days

jobs.title: Back-end Engineer
jobs.description:
Back-end Engineer


About us
Insurami is a new, tech-first insurance platform redesigning protection for landlords.

Our first insurance product provides the same protection as a traditional lease deposit for an office space, without the headache of holding tenant funds. £25bn is currently held as a lease deposit by UK landlords. Our products provide the same level of protection for the landlords, for a fraction of the cost for their tenants.

Our product makes deposit free renting a possibility and helps landlords attract a wider client base.



Job description

#About the Role
We are looking for a passionate Back-end Engineer to join our team.You will work on our core product, prototypes, MVP’s and iterative product development. Our tech stack is Python, GO, PostgreSQL, Celery, Serverless (Zappa) and Docker on AWS.

About you
You have been working as a mid/senior Back-end Engineer
You appreciate a TDD/BDD and CI/CD agile culture 
You love an environment focused on good Engineering practice and code reviews 
You are always happy to collaborate with others, guiding and mentoring where needed 
You have worked on full cycle product development and you are not afraid of deployment 
You are an avid problem solver and have experience in systems design and architecture

Requirements
Few years commercial experience in back-end engineering
Extensive experience using AWS or similar
Excellent command of any of the following Python, Ruby, NodeJS or GO
Extensive knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience working on small teams and being self-directed.

Bonus
Bachelor's/Master’s degree in any subject

Perks
As well as working in an exciting new Insurtech business, you will also have access to:

Highly competitive salary 
Share options scheme
Private health care
Clear career progression
Birthdays off
Work from home days

Our first insurance product provides the same protection as a traditional lease deposit for commercial real-estate, without the headache of holding tenant funds. £25bn is currently held as a lease deposit by UK landlords. Our products provide the same level of protection for the landlords, for a fraction of the cost for their tenants.

Our product makes deposit free renting a possibility and helps landlords attract a wider client base.
